title: Login Button Not Responsive
description: Clicking the login button does not trigger any action. Affects multiple browsers.

title: Mobile Navigation Menu Overlapping
description: Navigation menu overlaps with content on mobile devices.

title: Password Reset Email Not Sent
description: Users are not receiving password reset emails, causing account lockouts.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: Intermittent database connection issues causing failed requests.

title: Checkout Process Freezes
description: Users unable to complete checkout due to the process freezing at the payment step.

title: Profile Image Not Updating
description: Uploading a new profile image does not reflect on the frontend.
